name: St. Louis de Montfort

locations.description: French priest and missionary, founder of the Montfortians

summary: Louis de Montfort was a French priest and missionary known for his devotion to the Blessed Virgin Mary and his method of total consecration to Jesus through Mary. He founded the Company of Mary (Montfortians) and the Daughters of Wisdom. His writings, particularly 'True Devotion to Mary' and 'The Secret of the Rosary', have influenced many popes and saints, including Pope John Paul II.
